title: Official Box Owner Presents: Period, Sis- There's No Heartbeat
itunes:title: Official Box Owner Presents: Period, Sis- There's No Heartbeat
description:
Subscribe, Rate and Review to Mandii's new podcast Period, Sis now available wherever you listen to your favorite podcast. This new episode takes you on a journey through womanhood. If you're expecting another sex filled podcast, this isn't it. Every week join Mandii as she sits with friends and healthcare professionals to discuss all things womanhood! Topics include: PCOS, fibroids, yeast infections, motherhood, and more. This episode comes with a trigger warning! If you or anyone you know may have experienced a miscarriage, please listen with caution. Lindsey is the host of her own podcast "Journey From Infertility" follow her on social media @lindsey_jfi Support and follow Mandii on social media @fullcourtpumps and also the new podcast page @officialboxowner

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
